page.title: 04MODERN TIMES
page.content: LOTS OF GREAT BOWDEN IS NEW BUT LOTS OF BOWDEN IS VERY OLD.THE MODERN HOUSES ARE SPLIT INTO THEIR OWN PART. RECENTLY (ABOUT 3 YEARS AGO )A NEW PRIMARY SCHOOL WAS BUILT BUT THE OLD ONE IS STILL STANDING TODAY AND IS NOW ABOUT 143 YEARS OLD,THE OLD SCHOOL IS NOW A CHURCH-HALL,IT IS USED FOR THE MOTHERS UNION,PATHFINDERS,THE VILLAGE PLAY GROUP AND COFFEE MORNINGS.WE NOW ALSO HAVE A PUPLIC HOUSE WHICH USED TO BE CALLED THE FARRIERS AND CALLED THE COUNTRY-MAN INN,WE ALSO HAVE 2 OTHER PUPLIC HOUSES CALLED THE RED-LION AND THE SHOULDER OF MUTTON.ON THE GREEN(AN ISLAND OF GRASS) THERE IS A TROUGH WHICH IS VERY OLD AND IS KNOW USED AS A FLOWER BED.THE COB WALL IS MADE OF MIXED MUD AND STRAW,IT USED TO HAVE OLD TILES OR THATCH ON TOP.
